import React from 'react' import useProducts from '../data/useProducts' import HTMLReactParser from 'html-react-parser'; var productsNotNull = []; const Shop = () => { const products = useProducts(); products.map(item => ( productsNotNull = item )) console.log(productsNotNull); if (productsNotNull.length !== 0) { return (
Search & Filter
This is filter
Product List
{ productsNotNull.map(item => (

{item.name}

{item.description}

{HTMLReactParser(item.price)}
{item.reviews.averageRating}
)) }
) } } export default Shop
